p: We used 377 DSPR lines (154 from panel A and 223 from panel B, http://FlyRILs.org [ King et al., 2012; Long et al., 2014]), kindly provided by S.J. Macdonald, University of Kansas) to carry out a Quantitative Trait Locus (QTL) study to examine the genetic basis of resistance to DAffSV, DMelSV and DObsSV in D. melanogaster.
